reviews.review:
Where to start?

Let's just say I'm a HUGE fan of Dead By Daylight that I'm still playing it even after a lot of my friends have burnt out on it. This game is  great to play with friends, get a few jump scares in and scream about being tunneled off of hook. Don't get me wrong, there can be some gross players in this game but that doesn't make it bad. If you don't want to play with randoms, there is always the option to kill your friends which can be super fun. It's always being updated with new killers and survivors, and it just keeps getting better in my opinion. Give it a try, I'm positive you won't regret it!

Хорошая игра за свои деньги. В неё интересно играть как за мана, наказывая выживших, так и в пати с друзьями за сурвов, устраивая кибербуллинг фонариками и генрашем. Рекомендую! P.s. 4/4 повешенных сурвов в подвале, играя за буббу)))

来，骗，来，偷袭，我 1000小时的电工。

（偷鸡摸狗永远不会迟，一起来玩嗷^V^）

This is a great strategic take on slasher games. It includes almost every horror villain you love and more. The gameplay loop is really fun and makes me enjoy it even though I don't like horror games!

This game is amazing after a few hours there's some stuff that needs to be nerfed/buffed but the game for me is pretty good i'm around rank 4-5 and like Killer/surviver i would say i'm not a main for either anymore i use to be surviver main but now i play both probably just as much.

В целом о игре: Dead by Daylight жонглирует условностями и штампами фильмов-слэшеров, выстраивая на них весь игровой процесс. Классическая ситуация — герой что есть мочи улепетывает от маньяка, тот мрачно шагает следом, но все равно настигает жертву. В Dead by Daylight подобная волнующая сцена есть почти в каждом матче. Неубиваемый (буквально) маньяк всегда чуть быстрее жертв, он умеет читать оставленные ими следы, лучше видит карту и имеет куда больше времени для ее изучения. Беги не беги, а шанс, что убийца внезапно появится из-за угла или схватит за пятки, когда ты в отчаянии лезешь в окно, всегда велик.

В этом и интерес. Для обеих сторон.
one of gthe funnest game u can play by far
I sure do love it when half of the game gets fucked into the ground by the developers. Real good job here guys.

Gefällt mir sehr gut. Ich mag Horror- und Schleichspiele sehr gerne und bei DbD hat man beides. Leider haben sie dieses gute Spiel mit dem letzten Patch kaputt und für mich unspielbar gemacht. Es hat nur noch eine toxische Community und macht so keinen Spass mehr.

Where to begin.
While this game is at times frustrating as a wet sock, its also as fun as a dry fresh one when you have cold wet feet. 
I dont have a problem with the game play itself. 
Im a survivor main, and the game depends entirely on how good the killer is. You could end up having fun chases with mind games galore, killers with surprising strats and and thought out perks that makes you work for your teams win. You have to work and hope the rest of the team is having your back.

However, some killers will tunnel and facecamp because they are tired of chasing and multitasking. They just want to play a mass murderer with meek survivors. You have some survivors that fail to see its a team game, just hiding in a bush for 15 minutes completely paranoid. But luckily, theese games are over relatively quick.

Then you have games with awesome coordination (and Im not talking about SWF) where the ranks finally line up. Where you feel like a champ even tho two might have been sacrefised.

But the big thing that disappoint me most about the entire game; the developers.
They don't listen to the community at all. After 4 years, they are bugs, overpowered and under-powered perks and killers, there are addons that don't make sense. The game's imbalance are at times so frustrating that its stupid, but the developers just ignore players feedback and are more interested in showing dlc's and cosmetics in our faces. And every update brings bugs. Its like Christmas morning, but with bugs.
Its kinda known that most of the devs dont even know how to play the game. They live in their own little bubble at how they think the game works, and how it actually works. Just look at the breakable walls for a prime example of this. Its the shining star on how ignorant they are to how the game works.

Whenever people ask me if its a good game they should try out, I respond with a “meh”. Its a game for sure. And I keep coming back to it like a bad relationship because the good moments are rare but so worth it.

Only reason I put it on a “not recommended” is because there is no “meh” button. And at this point the devs don't seem to give a shit about anything but money. 
Honestly, at this point Id rather wait a year or two for DBD 2, a fresh start with new coding, where they show us they have learned from their mistakes, they have listened to the players feedback and improved the game and themselves.	

Edit: typo
This is one of the most poorly designed games I have ever played.

This game is still in a situation where if you are new, you will understand very little. You most likely not have a great time going in blind. 
The grind for this game is still currently intensely bad, 3/4 perks are pointless to run since they aren't meta, and trust me. Most people will be running the same unfun meta perks. 
You basically either need to have a lot of patience and time to learn the game, or need to go out of your way to learn the ins and outs of this game to do well. 
I really don't recommend it if you don't have patience, good memory, or don't want to support a developing studio that prioritizes getting out more content over fixing their spaghetti coded, buggy mess of a game.
Пока это хорошая игра, но я с нетерпением жду новых обновлений. Слишком много фейскэмперов, портящих игру всем. Разработчикам следует запретить людям посещать фейс-лагерь.
